analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/26/0x093de85f29ab488c6dcdda42d5d9816a45cb1612.sol:
	Contract ObitanChainToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/26/0x093de85f29ab488c6dcdda42d5d9816a45cb1612.sol#205-206)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/26/0x093de85f29ab488c6dcdda42d5d9816a45cb1612.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/26/0x093de85f29ab488c6dcdda42d5d9816a45cb1612.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/26/0x093de85f29ab488c6dcdda42d5d9816a45cb1612.sol#75-76) is not in mixedCase
